name: Earth Liberators
description:
This is my first Godot game! (Go easy on it) Made for the Weekly Game Jam 161 under the theme of 'Pilot'.

Pilot the evil space invaders  Earth Liberators as they try to liberate the Earth or something I don't know.

Click the screen to play (suprising that's a thing you have to do!)

Left/Right arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to shoot.

The goal is to get the Earth Liberator Edgeless Cube Ball past the defense at the bottom of the screen. Good luck!
